ntee::Buffer Struct Reference

A common data flow buffer. Encapsulates one message from one direction to another and records the time of the transfer. The destructor of a Buffer will call delete on any buf available --so make sure you assign buffers which have been dynamically allocated. More...

bool dyn_
 true if payload was dynamically allocated with malloc

Detailed Description

A common data flow buffer. Encapsulates one message from one direction to another and records the time of the transfer. The destructor of a Buffer will call delete on any buf available --so make sure you assign buffers which have been dynamically allocated.
